Global design firm IDEO is growing its software design group in Cambridge, MA, and is looking for a senior colleague to lead small, interdisciplinary teams. This role is full time and onsite.

Software design places the user at the heart of technology. From early prototypes to production-ready concepts, software developers and creative coders create functional designs and lend a tech-forward lens to every step of the design process.

Learn more here - https://www.ideo.com/jobs/software/cambridge/1479065/team-le...
